description: Provides a list of contacts in the authenticated user's other contacts that matches the search query. The query matches on a contact's `names`, `emailAddresses`, and `phoneNumbers` fields that are from the OTHER_CONTACT source. **IMPORTANT**: Before searching, clients should send a warmup request with an empty query to update the cache. See https://developers.google.com/people/v1/other-contacts#search_the_users_other_contacts

schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/contacts` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
Optional. The number of results to return. Defaults to 10 if field is not set, or set to 0. Values greater than 30 will be capped to 30.

Required. The plain-text query for the request. The query is used to match prefix phrases of the fields on a person. For example, a person with name "foo name" matches queries such as "f", "fo", "foo", "foo n", "nam", etc., but not "oo n".

Required. A field mask to restrict which fields on each person are returned. Multiple fields can be specified by separating them with commas. Valid values are: * emailAddresses * metadata * names * phoneNumbers
